casebody.data:
THE NO. C-4 (two cases). (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 5, 1924.) Nos. 344, 345. Kirlin, Woolsey, Campbell, Hickox & Keating, of New York City (Robert S. Erskine, of New York City, of counsel), for Cornell Steamboat Co. Bigham, Englar & Jones, of New York City (L. J. Matteson, of New York City, of counsel), for claimant-appellee. Alexander & Ash, of New York City (Peter Alexander, of New York City, of counsel), for New York, Ontario & Western Railroad Co.

Before ROGERS, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges,

PER CURIAM.

Decrees (300 Fed. 757) affirmed.
